com.ptc.core.components.visualization

Interface VisualizationDelegate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractVisualizationDelegate, DefaultVisualizationDelegate, WVSVisualizationDelegate

    public interface VisualizationDelegate
    A delegate that decides whether visualization should be shown for a certain type. It's best to extend the AbstractVisualizationDelegate, or the DefaultVisualizationDelegate rather than implementing this interface directly.

    Supported API: true

    Extendable: true
    See Also:
    AbstractVisualizationDelegate} {@link DefaultVisualizationDelegate}

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      VisualizationComponent getVisualizationComponent(java.lang.Object datum, ServletRequest request)
      Care should be taken to return a VisualizationComponent which renders to the correct width and height, to avoid being resized in the browser.
      boolean showMiniVisualization(UIValidationCriteria validationCriteria) 
      boolean showVisualization(UIValidationCriteria validationCriteria) 

    • Method Detail

      • getVisualizationComponent

        VisualizationComponent getVisualizationComponent(java.lang.Object datum,
                                                 ServletRequest request)
        Care should be taken to return a VisualizationComponent which renders to the correct width and height, to avoid being resized in the browser. If this is being rendered to the Information Page, refer to these two properties set in wvs.properties.xconf: thumbnail.generator.width and thumbnail.generator.height *

        Supported API: true
        Returns:
        the proper visualization component for the given datum

      • showVisualization

        boolean showVisualization(UIValidationCriteria validationCriteria)
        Returns:
        true to show visualization on the info page and false otherwise

        Supported API: true

      • showMiniVisualization

        boolean showMiniVisualization(UIValidationCriteria validationCriteria)
        Returns:
        true to show visualization on the mini info navigator and false otherwise

        Supported API: true
